Abstract Algebra | General results regarding cyclic groups.

\begin{array}{c}\n\mathbb{Z}_{\mathbf{n}}=\langle\mathbf{m}\rangle \\\n\text { if and only if } \\\n\operatorname{gcd}(\mathbf{m}, \mathbf{n})=\mathbf{1}\n\end{array}[imath]\mathbb{Z}_{\mathbf{n}}=\langle\mathbf{m}\rangle [/imath] [imath]\text { if and only if } [/imath] [imath]\operatorname{gcd}(\mathbf{m}, \mathbf{n})=\mathbf{1}[/imath]
